about.title: About Penguins
about.subtitle: Discover the remarkable world of penguins, their incredible adaptations, and their fascinating life in the Antarctic wilderness.

cards.title: Antarctic Royalty
cards.description: Emperor penguins are the tallest and heaviest of all penguin species, perfectly adapted to survive in the harshest Antarctic conditions.

cards.title: Ice Masters
cards.description: These incredible birds can dive to depths of over 500 meters and hold their breath for up to 20 minutes while hunting for fish.

cards.title: Ocean Athletes
cards.description: Penguins are exceptional swimmers, using their flipper-like wings to "fly" through the water at speeds up to 22 mph.

highlight.title: Guardians of Antarctica
highlight.description: Penguins are living symbols of resilience and community. They huddle together for warmth during brutal Antarctic winters, demonstrating remarkable social behavior that has captivated scientists and nature lovers for generations.
